home.your_tool: The sur­vey tool for your event.
home.benefit_3: Free of charge, clear, sim­ple, fast.

benefit_5.title: You're plan­ning a big event?
benefit_5.content_1: Con­tact our de­vel­op­er for de­tailed arrange­ments.

benefit_6.title: Do­na­tion
benefit_6.content_1: If you like feedb.ax, you can sup­port the CJ and our de­vel­op­er with a con­tri­bu­tion of your choice.

cookie_consent.title: We use cook­ies!
cookie_consent.content:
This web­site only uses cook­ies, In­dexed­DB and Lo­cal­Stor­age en­tries to en­sure the op­er­a­tion of the ser­vice.
We do not use cook­ies for analy­sis or ad­ver­tis­ing pur­pos­es. You can use our ser­vice com­plete­ly free of charge and anony­mous­ly.
cookie_consent.small: You can find more in­for­ma­tion about cook­ies, their use and gen­er­al data pro­tec­tion at
